reports.title: OpenClaw Research (McKinsey-Style)
reports.summary: Comprehensive McKinsey-style report: Executive Summary, Technical Architecture (Gateway, channels, security, skills), Top 9 Use Cases with examples, Competitive Landscape (vs ChatGPT, Claude, Zapier, Make, Botpress), Implementation Considerations (setup, security, maintenance), Appendix with sources.

reports.title: Security Audit
reports.summary: Risk Level: MEDIUM. Key findings: API credentials in config (MEDIUM), Browser profiles (MEDIUM), Cron jobs (LOW), Network exposure (LOW).

reports.title: Multi-Agent Setup Guide
reports.summary: Guide from @sitinme on setting up 8 AI employees with OpenClaw. Covers process isolation, multi-model strategy, workflow automation, and cost breakdown (~$100/month).
